price: 6. tam, kad tu perspėtum žmones, kurių protėviai nebuvo perspėti, taigi jie yra neatidūs.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
